data.title: James Rubin and Christiane Amanpour
data.meta_description: American foreign policy in a chaotic world Sixty minutes with a formidable couple: CNN’s Christiane Amanpour alongside her husband, former US Assistant Secretary of State, Jamie Rubin combining their skills to share the background to US foreign policy and the role of the media in shaping the foreign policy context.
data.text:
American foreign policy in a chaotic world

Sixty minutes with a formidable couple: CNN’s Christiane Amanpour alongside her husband, former US Assistant Secretary of State, Jamie Rubin combining their skills to share the background to US foreign policy and the role of the media in shaping the foreign policy context.
